long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A very simple on-page SEO plugin....it is supposed to simply show the metas of the page and analyze the frequency of word usage (KW density). And a couple more functions: to show images, links and headers on the page.
